item.title: AID Systems Help T2D Patients Regardless of C-Peptide Levels
item.description: Adults with insulin-treated type 2 diabetes benefit from automated insulin delivery systems regardless of their C-peptide levels, a recent study shows...

item.title: Type 2 Diabetes Hits Hard in Congenital Heart Disease
item.description: Onset of diabetes before age 40 is associated with 2.5 times higher risk for mortality than onset at a later age. Medscape Medical News
